metadata.synopsis: goblin raider involved in the attack on the grove - some lines before the attack, one in the aftermath

1.speaker: Skrut
1.text: Drow sez they've got kids in there...

0.speaker: Skrut
0.text: ... gonna try an' catch one. Be a nice plaything for my little 'uns.

2.speaker: Skrut
2.text: Meant to keep one alive fer a pet - they broke too easy.
2.context: NodeContext: disappointed - just slaughtered the inhabitants of a refuge and wishing it had been a harder fight
